original_text: And let them gather all the food of those good years that come, and lay up corn under the hand of Pharaoh, and let them keep food in the cities.
korean_text: 그들로 장차 올 풍년의 모든 곡물을 거두고 그 곡물을 바로의 손에 돌려 양식을 위하여 각 성읍에 쌓아 두게 하소서

sentences.original_text: And let them gather all the food
of those good years that come
and lay up corn under the hand of Pharaoh
sentences.korean_translation: 바로의 손 아래 곡물을 저장하게 하라

sentences.original_text: and let them keep food in the cities
